Sentencas: Plasma spraying is one of the potential manufacturing technologies widely used in tubular solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC) fabrication.
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The plasma spray technology requires powders with good flowability and large particle size (5-200 mu m).
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A simple, low temperature assisted chemical process was used for the preparation of plasma grade yttria stabilized zirconia powder without any agglomeration process.
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The powder was characterized by X-ray diffractometry, particle size analysis, scanning electron microscopy and Raman spectroscopy.
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The powder exhibited cubic phase, good flowability and blocky angular shape.
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The 8YSZ powder was plasma sprayed and the coatings after sintering showed gas tightness (gas leak rate similar to 1 x 10(-6)
Titulo: Low temperature assisted chemical coprecipitation synthesis of 8YSZ plasma sprayable powder for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This was substantiated by the presence of densely packed grains as seen in the surface FESEM image of the sintered plasma sprayed 8YSZ free form.

Sentencas: Conductivity values in par with the values reported in literature were obtained for plasma sprayed 8YSZ coating.
